content1.EN:
• Module 1 – What is FERPA & Who Must Comply?
    What is the purpose of the Act, to whom does it apply, and how is it enforced?

  • Module 2 – Student Rights
    Who does FERPA protect and to what guaranteed rights are they entitled?

  • Module 3 – Parents
    What rights do parents have under FERPA?

  • Module 4 – Education Records
    How does FERPA define education records?

  • Module 5 – Types of Information
    How does FERPA distinguish types of information?

  • Module 6 – Consent
    What is required to release and share student information?

  • Module 7 – FERPA in the College Community
    What responsibilities are given to your school and how do they affect your job duties?
